widget.name: r6 strat roulette
widget.description:
the best rainbow six seige strat roulette app with over 100 different strats
Also, some stats mention leaderboards, go with the order BEFORE action phase It is only fun that you use recruit with these strats. It is expected that not following these strats will result in death. Pick any loadout you wish, if it states what to use, use the listed things. Have fun!. strats from u/luhued
widget.author: cormac miles
